body_html:
device_ids should always contain 0. If you want to specify which GPUs to use, you can set the environment variable CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES, either by running your script like this:

CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=1,2 python your_script.py

or set it programmatically in your script like this:

os.environ['CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES'] = '1, 2'

So that device_ids 0, 1 will map to GPUs 1, 2, respectively.
(Note that for the second method, you should put that line before any cuda relevant function call.)

body:
`device_ids` should always contain `0`. If you want to specify which GPUs to use, you can set the environment variable `CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES`, either by running your script like this:
```
CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=1,2 python your_script.py
```
or set it programmatically in your script like this:
```
os.environ['CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES'] = '1, 2'
```
So that device_ids 0, 1 will map to GPUs 1, 2, respectively.
(Note that for the second method, you should put that line before any cuda relevant function call.)
